Title: Glow in the Dark
Description:
Codswallop! Peevish has run off again. He is assigned to this post but is never here!

I heard him screaming from the nearby cave. He must have tried to hide in there.

Take my torch and go to the Coldshadow Cave.  Find Peevish along with the bottles of Dauntless Draught he stole. He can desert his post if he wants,  but I won't let him take the drinks!
ObjectivesText: Locate "Peevish" Paeton Berncort and recover 1 bottles of Dauntless Draught.
CompletionText: Have you found "Peevish" Paeton Berncort and the bottles of Dauntless Draught he took with him?
RewardText:
I didn't anticipate Peevish would muster the courage to return, but at least you recovered the Draught. 

We'll raise a toast and wish him luck in that cave.
